data.title: Corleone's has really good, fresh breakfast burrito's, sandwiches and salads.
data.text: Good sized portions for the price. Corleone's uses super fresh veggies (I usually get the salads), unlike other places I've been where they use dry/old pre-cut carrots/celery, etc. All veggies seem to be cut onsite. Also they use real avocados! Not some weird avocado paste like most sandwich places do. They deliver lunches to local businesses which is how I heard about them, they come to my work. The restaurant location itself is a drive-thru only, no seating just fyi.

data.title: Gotta try this place!
data.text: Had a restaurant in Downtown Greeley and unfortunately didn't make it due to our poor economy,Too Bad.So far have only tried the Biscuits and Gravy(only served on Saturdays) and the Breakfast Burritos.The Best value in town for the Burritos.They serve other items for Breakfast,Salads,Soups,and both Hot and Cold Sandwiches for lunch.I think they are usually only open until 3p.m.,but they have Taco Tuesdays and Spaghetti Thursdays which they are serving from 5-8p.m.Excellent Food!
